title.narrative: Evaluation of contributions with state authorities
Evaluation of contributions with state authorities

description.narrative: Evaluation of contibutions in Georgia that involved copacity building of State Authorities by an consultant through call-off contract

PLEASE REVIEW YOUR ANSWER AS THE QUESTION HAS BEEN CHANGED
In line with current Country strategy within sector area: Democracy, human rights and gender equality and Market Development Sida supported a number of Georgian State authorities through building their capacity. The purpose of the review is to look at different modalities of the Swedish support to Georgia´s public administration reforms (e.g. Swedish governmental agency having long term presence in Georgia; Swedish governmental agency without long term presence; direct support from Sida to Georgian agency; other possible ways of support, including experience from other countries) in order for Sida to take informed decisions on modalities in the future, especially when it is expected to have Country Strategy very soon.
The consultant also will conduct post-completion review of the project “Promoting Integrity of Civil Data in Georgia” that was implemented by Public Service Development Agency of Georgia and assess its effectiveness.
I enlighet med gällande samarbetsstrategin och inom sektorn ”Demokrati, mänskliga rättigheter och jämställdhet” har Sida bistått med kapacitetsuppbyggnad till ett flertal georgiska statliga myndigheter. Syftet med utvärderingen är att granska de olika metoderna som har tillämpats av svenska myndigheter inom stödet till georgiska reformer inom offentlig förvaltning (svenska myndigheter med långsiktig närvaro i Georgien, svenska myndigheter utan långsiktig närvaro, direkt stöd från Sida till georgiska myndigheter och erfarenhet från andra länder.) Utvärderingen är viktig för att Sida skall kunna fatta välgrundade beslut kring framtida tillämpningsmetoder, framför allt i avvaktan av den nya samarbetsstrategin.
